comments:
Driver: 0917I

Going through Web Service top down scenario on a WSDL file in a path containing 
a space (this could either be in the workspace directory name, project name or 
directory name) would result in an error:

IWAB0028E Failed to copy WSDL file:/D:/wtp/0917I/eclipse/workspace/space 
proj/WebContent/AreaService.wsdl to file:/D:/wtp/0917I/eclipse/workspace/space 
proj/WebContent/wsdl/AreaServiceSOAP.wsdl
    java.net.URISyntaxException: Illegal character in path at index 42: 
file:/D:/wtp/0917I/eclipse/workspace/space proj/WebContent/AreaService.wsdl
    at java.net.URI$Parser.fail(URI.java:2752)
    at java.net.URI$Parser.checkChars(URI.java:2925)
    at java.net.URI$Parser.parseHierarchical(URI.java:3009)
    at java.net.URI$Parser.parse(URI.java:2957)
    at java.net.URI.<init>(URI.java:574)
    at 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.command.common.CopyWSDLCommand.copyWSDL
(CopyWSDLCommand.java:106)
    at 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.command.common.CopyWSDLCommand.execute
(CopyWSDLCommand.java:80)
    at 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.axis.creation.ui.task.Skeleton2WSDLCommand.execute
(Skeleton2WSDLCommand.java:204)
    at 
org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.runComm
and(CommandFragmentEngine.java:335)

Created an attachment (id=27548)
Patch for jst.ws.consumption

Created an attachment (id=27590)
Updated patch for jst.ws.consumption

This patch should be applied on M8 (i.e. tag v20050912_1400 of the
jst.ws.consumption plugin).

Created an attachment (id=27591)
JAR for jst.ws.consumption plugin

This should replace the wsc.jar in the org.eclipse.jst.ws plugin in the M8
driver.

Created an attachment (id=27592)
Jar for jst.ws.consumption plugin

This should replace wsc.jar in the org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption plugin in the
M8 driver.

To get this fix on the M8 driver, do one of the following:

In a self-hosting environment, get the M8 level of code (tag v20050912_1400) 
for the org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption plugin from the jst.ws component and 
apply attachment 27590 (updated patch for jst.ws.consumption).

OR

In a M8 driver, backup wsc.jar in the in the org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption 
plugin and replace with attachment 27592 and update META-INF/MANIFEST.MF of the 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption plugin to replace the line:

org.eclipse.ui

with

org.eclipse.ui,
org.eclipse.wst.common.uriresolver

Make sure to start eclipse with the "eclipse -clean" option to pick up the new 
changes.

Created an attachment (id=27913)
META-INF/MANIFEST.MF for org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption plugin

You can also pick up the updated manifest file (attachment 27913) rather than 
editing the file yourself.
*** Bug 120127 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
